screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .zmf file in Zoner Callisto 5
screenshot.caption: ZMF file open in Zoner Callisto 5

description: Zoner Callisto is typically used by graphic designers, illustrators, and desktop publishing professionals in Central and Eastern Europe. Since Zoner software only supports the ZMF format, users typically export their designs to more universal formats, such as .JPEG or .PNG , to share with others.
NOTE: Zoner Software discontinued Callisto after releasing version 5 in 2012.
